statements: UPDATE farm_operations SET renewable_energy_usage = 75.5, carbon_footprint_calculation = 250.30 WHERE farm_id = 1;
UPDATE farm_operations SET waste_management_practices = 'Composting, Recycling' WHERE farm_name = 'Green Acres';
UPDATE farm_operations SET renewable_energy_usage = 75.0, carbon_footprint_calculation = 205.40 WHERE farm_id = 1;
UPDATE farm_operations SET waste_management_practices = 'Recycling and composting', renewable_energy_usage = 85.6 WHERE farm_name = 'Sunny Acres';
UPDATE energy_usage SET energy_amount = 500.00 WHERE farm_id = 1;
UPDATE waste_management SET waste_amount = 1000.50, waste_disposal_method = 'Recycling' WHERE farm_id = 2;
UPDATE energy_usage SET energy_amount = energy_amount + 100 WHERE farm_id = 1 AND energy_type = 'Solar' AND timestamp <= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
UPDATE waste_management SET waste_amount = waste_amount - 50, waste_disposal_method = 'Recycling' WHERE farm_id = 2 AND waste_type = 'Plastic' AND timestamp >= '2021-12-01 00:00:00';
UPDATE renewable_energy SET amount = 5000.00, date = '2022-09-30' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE waste_management SET disposal_method = 'Recycling', weight = 10.5 WHERE type = 'Plastic';
UPDATE renewable_energy SET amount = 500.75 WHERE source = 'Solar'
UPDATE waste_management SET disposal_method = 'Recycling' WHERE type = 'Plastic'
UPDATE renewable_energy_usage SET energy_consumption = 500.75 WHERE energy_source = 'Solar';
UPDATE carbon_footprint_calculations SET total_carbon_emissions = 1500.25, calculation_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE farm_id = 101;
UPDATE renewable_energy_usage SET energy_consumption = 1500.75, date_recorded = '2022-04-15' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE waste_management_practices SET recycling_method = 'Composting', waste_quantity = 350.25 WHERE waste_type = 'Organic';
UPDATE Energy_Usage SET energy_amount = 500.00 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Farm_Details SET crop_type = 'Organic' WHERE farm_id = 3;
UPDATE Energy_Usage SET energy_amount = 1500.75 WHERE farm_id = 101 AND energy_source = 'Solar';
UPDATE Farm_Details SET crop_type = 'Organic' WHERE farm_id = 102 AND farm_size > 50.00;
